packt.java9.by.example.mastermind

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • packt.java9.by.example.mastermind.Color

  • public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a color in the MasterMind table. Each color has a serial value that is used internally to sort the colors so that there is a first color, last color and for each color, except the last, there is a next color managed by a color manager.

    Colors are equal if the serial number is the same.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Color none
      A special object that represents a value that is not a valid color.
